steps.conclusion: None. The output follows all key rules for language exams: exactly one suggestion, title is the exam name (TOEFL), is_language_course=true, english_title provided and appropriate, no extra add-ons, icon has tabler- prefix, Portuguese description, title length <=5 words, no levels/joiners.
None. All required fields are correctly populated and meet formatting constraints.

Minor stylistic enhancement could be to use European Portuguese phrasing consistency (e.g., “exame” vs “teste”), but this is non-essential. Icon could be more semantically tied to language (e.g., tabler-language), though current one is acceptable.
